history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00525
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A MAGNA CARTA OF AGRICULTURE AND FISHERY DEVELOPMENT WORKERS
SHORT TITLE : Magna Carta Of Agriculture And Fishery Development Workers
ABSTRACT : Aims to improve the employment well being of the following: Agricultural engineer, agriculturist, aquaculturist, nutritionist, veterinarian, extension worker, technician and operator.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATOCABE, RODEL M., GARBIN, ALFREDO JR. A., CO, CHRISTOPHER S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
